text-node.description: This Pipeline contains all the Jobs that are setup on the site that don't pertain to a particular integration (These largely focus around Importing the IP feed)

This job is written to ONLY run in production. The reason for this is that inventory is non replicable (can't push from staging to production) whereas all the other data from IP is. Since simplefeeds deletes any file it imports we only get one shot to load inventory (can't load it on staging and on production)
Only allow to run this job in production regardless of how its configured inside of business manager
Generate an XML file to set the exclusiveType customer attribute on products
